problem_text_cn: 如图,在Rt△ABC中,∠C=90°,AC=8,AB=10,点O为BC上的点,⊙O的半径OC=1,点D是AB边上的动点,过点D作⊙O的一条切线DE(点E为切点),则线段DE的最小值为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in Rt△ABC, ∠C = N_0, AC = N_1, AB = N_2, point O is the point on BC, the radius of ⊙O OC = N_3, point D is the moving point on the edge of AB, passing the point D to draw a tangent DE of ⊙O (point E is the tangent point), then the minimum value of the line segment DE is ()
raw_answer: 解:如图,连接OE、OD,在Rt△ABC中,∵∠C=90°,AC=8,AB=10,∴BC=6,∵DE为⊙O的切线,∴∠DEO=90°,∴DE²+OE²=OD²,∵OE=1,∴DE²=OD²-1,即DE=√{OD^{2}-1},要使DE最小,则OD最小即可,∵D为AB边上的动点,∴当OD⊥AB时,OD最小,∵BC=6,OC=1,∴BO=5,∵∠ODB=∠ACB=90°,∠B=∠B,∴△BDO∽△BCA,∴\frac{OD}{AC}=\frac{B0}{AB},即\frac{OD}{8}=\frac{5}{10},解得:OD=4,∴DE=√{4^{2}-1}=√{15},故选:C．
